channel.title: Softlayer_container_utility_microsoft_windows_updateservices_updateitem on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_container_utility_microsoft_windows_updateservices_updateitem on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Utility_Microsoft_Windows_UpdateServices_UpdateItem
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Utility_Microsoft_Windows_UpdateServices_UpdateItem Datatype Description SoftLayer_Container_Utility_Microsoft_Windows_UpdateServices_UpdateItem models a single Microsoft Update as reported by SoftLayer’s private Windows Server Update Services (WSUS) services. All servers purchased with Microsoft Windows retrieve updates from SoftLayer’s WSUS servers by default. External Links Windows Server Update Services (WSUS) Home Microsoft Help and Support associatedMethods SoftLayer_Hardware_Server::getWindowsUpdateAvailableUpdates SoftLayer_Hardware_Server::getWindowsUpdateInstalledUpdates seeAlso SoftLayer_Container_Utility_Microsoft_Windows_UpdateServices_Status Local description A short description of a Microsoft Windows Update.

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Utility_Microsoft_Windows_UpdateServices_UpdateItem

All servers purchased with Microsoft Windows retrieve updates from SoftLayer’s WSUS servers by default. Local description A short description of a Microsoft Windows Update. Type: string failed Flag indicating that this patch failed to properly install Type: boolean kbArticleNumber A Windows Update's knowledge base article number.
